header: Burim Trading providing FFT import and export solutions.

body1.description: We are specializes in providing the full packaged service for Import & Export in Korea, such as quarantine, customs clearance, documentation review(KFDA legal review), storage, and transportation.

1.title: Quarantine & Customs clearance
1.description: Proposing the best solution for importing, ensuring safety and value by reviewing domestic regulations on imported goods in advance.

2.title: Logistic
2.description: providing safe storage and responsible transportation for items requiring temperature and humidity control, refrigeration, freezing, or ambient temperature

3.title: Global market
3.description: Creating value in the global market by exporting competitively processed food items, fresh products, and manufactured goods, including direct exports or trade with third countries

4.title: R&D business
4.description: Aim to foster innovation by applying advanced global technology to our existing business and seek sustainable growth by exploring new industries.â€‹
